<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Aldori Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=879) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 35 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Aldori Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=14)

**Prerequisites**
[Aldori Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=877)

**Trigger**
An opponent within your reach critically fails a Strike against you.

**Requirements**
You are benefiting from Aldori Parry.

</column>

---

You riposte with your [Aldori dueling sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=88) when your enemy leaves an opening. Make a melee Strike or use a [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) action against the triggering opponent using your Aldori dueling sword.
name: Aldori Riposte
requirement: You are benefiting from Aldori Parry.
